becomes a holy exercise when done in a
spirit of divine contemplation the test
of the cella
is your power to do well happily and
joyously that task before you however
great or obscure
the hallmark of the true master is
spiritual greatness of soul not of power
of mind or success in politics religion
or science not by their powers mental or
occult do we know them but by their
inner majesty of spirit
